title: Elderwood Bard's Visuals Are Messed Up
body:
Sorry I don't have a link, but 100% reproduction rate.

On Bard's Elderwood skin his W particles are mixed with his base skin, for example using thebase and green particles of his base, but still has the main flower from Elderwood.

replies.body: Additionally, his Laugh Taunt (Ctrl + 4 default I think) doesn't work properly and just freezes Bard in place.
Yep! D: This should also be fixed in 8.7!

Hey Turritop! 
This should be fixed up in 8.7, which is set to deploy this week! If you're still seeing this in the new patch, please lemme know! :)
